body: Here, you'd want to do some sort of "if device is not set, set it to `context_`." You'd have to make a copy of TensorOptions, but it's only two words, not too expensive :)
body_html: Here, you'd want to do some sort of "if device is not set, set it to context_." You'd have to make a copy of TensorOptions, but it's only two words, not too expensive :)
body_text: Here, you'd want to do some sort of "if device is not set, set it to context_." You'd have to make a copy of TensorOptions, but it's only two words, not too expensive :)
